data.name: Smart Start Bonus Saver
data.description: Packaged with the Smart Start Access account, the Smart Start Bonus account is a great start for 18-29yr olds in the workforce looking to maximise their interest saved

bundles.name: Smart Start Bonus Saver
bundles.description: Packaged with the Smart Start Access account, the Smart Start Bonus account is a great start for 18-29yr olds in the workforce looking to maximise their interest saved

eligibility.additionalInfo: The SmartStart package is limited to accountholders who are 18 to 29 years old
On a SmartStart accountholder’s 30th birthday, the account funds and facilities are transferred to an On Call Savings Account and an interest bearing account

The SmartStart package is limited to accountholders who are 18 to 29 years old in the workforce. The bonus interest is only paid where a minimum payroll credit of $1500 is electronically deposited to the Member’s smartSTART Bonus Saver Account each month
Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

fees.name: Direct Debits
fees.additionalInfo: This Fee is Rebateable and is added to other Rebateable Fees before Fee Rebate Applied. 5 Free Transactions per month.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Rate calculated if the account doesn't meet bonus rate requirements

depositRates.additionalValue: Bonus Interest raid calculated and paid if min.deposit $1500/ month made,otherwise calculates at the variable interest rate

lendingRates.additionalValue: The interest rate that applies to any overdrawn amounts.

features.additionalInfo: By increasing your total balance (deposits and loans) through saving, investing and borrowing with us, you pay fewer transaction costs.
Receive monthly bonus interest when a credit of $1500 or more is deposited into the account each month
24/7 access to your accounts anywhere in the world with our smartPAY App.
Secure banking 24/7 from your computer or mobile with Online Banking
View your statements via Online Banking
